headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co https://accounts.google.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.googleusercontent.com https://*.supabase.co; font-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'self' https://accounts.google.com https://*.supabase.co;
